channel.title: Pages on LoreNeil

item.title: Our Story
item.description:
Lorenzo’s and Neil’s story is something of both special and incredible .. They were both strangers living their own life on the opposite sides of this planet, and on a particular day everything changed for the better in an unpredictable way. It all started with a like by Lorenzo on an Instagram photo captured and posted by Neil on a sunny day in his Manila’s neighbourhood, edited using the Filmborn app; from there they started exchanging messages, became best buds for life and eventually fell in Love.

So they texted, FaceTimed and planned their first heavenly trip as a couple to: Vietnam, Cambodia and Thailand; but for some diabolical forces beyond their control it couldn’t go through. So Lorenzo moved to the UK and Neil back in his hometown, both looking for a job that could make the dream of ending their long distance chapter.

A year later they finally both made it happen to complete the best trip ever done on Earth as a couple. They traveled north and south the Philippines together, met Neil’s family, creating the best memories they ever had, sharing and caring the Love they have for each other. After traveling many places in Asia together, such as: Singapore, Malaysia, Hong Kong and Macao; they wanted to visit Europe with Lorenzo’s family as well.

With the first Italian VISA rejection Lorenzo traveled back to Neil in the Philippines with a promise: to never leave each other up until a positive result would come. Another rejection and many many problems came their way, but those didn’t let them down. After two years leaving together in the Philippines their wish came true, the VISA was finally approved!

Now, another wonderful chapter of their life is about to happen, wishing that you could join them in their new beginning…
